name: Mario Martinez
coverLetter: Hey guys my names Mario I’m a very friendly person.l, I’ve never worked in the industry before but I’m very knowledgeable about cannabis the different strains, concentrates, edibles etc. I normally do maintenance as my regular 9-5 but I’m looking for a side hustle and what better way than doing something you love and working with great people! If you guys are interested please don’t hesitate to call my cell is 8053908731. Thanks for your time have a good one.
